mapper.select:
SELECT A.SCHEDULE_ID, A.OPERATION_TYPE, A.NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, A.TUTORING_NUMBER, A.SCHEDULE_START, A.SCHEDULE_END, DATE_FORMAT(A.SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i') SCHEDULE_START_TIME, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(A.SCHEDULE_START,'%H:%i'),'~',DATE_FORMAT(A.SCHEDULE_END,'%H:%i')) SCHEDULE_TIME, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(A.SCHEDULE_START,'%Y년 %m월 %d일'), ' 일정') SCHEDULE_DATE, (SELECT NAME FROM PLAY WHERE PLAY.PLAY_ID = A.PLAY_ID) PLAY_NAME, A.REG_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') REG_DATE, A.UPD_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') UPD_DATE, A.SUB_TOPIC, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R WHERE A.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID AND R.TUTORING_YN = 'Y' AND R.STATUS IN ('02', '04')) RESERVATION_COUNT, TUTORING_NUMBER - ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R WHERE A.SCHEDULE_ID = R.SCHEDULE_ID AND R.TUTORING_YN = 'Y' AND R.STATUS IN ('02', '04'))) RESERVATION_AVA_COUNT FROM SCHEDULE A
AND A.TUTORING_NUMBER > 0
AND A.STORE_ID = #{storeId}
AND A.SCHEDULE_START BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND A.SCHEDULE_START > NOW() AND A.SCHEDULE_START BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '235959'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND A.SCHEDULE_END BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{scheduleStart}, '000000'), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AND NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( OPERATION_TYPE, NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, TUTORING_NUMBER, SCHEDULE_START, SCHEDULE_END, PLAY_ID, STORE_ID, SUB_TOPIC, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{operationType}, #{numberOfPeople}, #{tutoringNumber}, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), INTERVAL #{scheduleEnd} MINUTE), #{playId}, #{storeId}, #{subTopic}, #{regId}, NOW() )
